snippet.title: Sonokuni Trailer – PC Gaming Show: Most Wanted 2024
snippet.description:
Sonokuni is a psychedelic, Hotline-Miami-esque action game developed by a Japanese hip-hop crew. Surely you don’t need more information than that. Oh, all right. With death just a single-hit away, you must use time-manipulating abilities to perfect your runs and save your nation. https://store.steampowered.com/app/2054380/SONOKUNI/

https://www.pcgamer.com
